meanings.definition: A polymer consisting of a chain of nucleotides
meanings.sent1: Scientists study polynucleotides to understand how genetic information is stored.
meanings.sent2: DNA is made up of polynucleotides that carry genetic instructions.
meanings.sent3: The polynucleotides in the cell were having a party, celebrating their important role.
meanings.sent4: The polynucleotides of knowledge intertwined to form the book of life.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the polynucleotides danced like tiny beads on a string.

meanings.definition: Long chains of nucleotides that make up DNA and RNA
meanings.sent1: The structure of polynucleotides determines the genetic code of an organism.
meanings.sent2: RNA contains polynucleotides that help in protein synthesis.
meanings.sent3: The polynucleotides in the test tube decided to race each other for fun.
meanings.sent4: The polynucleotides of DNA whispered the secrets of life to the curious scientist.
meanings.sent5: In the nucleus, the polynucleotides hummed a melodious tune of heredity.
